> 
> Quickstride narrows his eyes and puts his ears aback.
> 
> " Then wh=
y the pit did ya start on Rattrap when ya know damn well that you are in th=
e company of Maximals?  That was dumb on your part."


DINOBOT grinned, "To=
 see if they had changed at all.  Instead, I see merely that they continue =
the disintegration of their own cause, and if anything it has progressed fa=
ster.  You are like an infestation of scraplets, projecting all faults outw=
ards to others and in denial of your own contributions.  The rat lead to my=
 death, and I believe under any right I have to be upset with him, even by =
Maximal standards.  And then your friend here drew her weapons and threaten=
ed to assault me when you had called us here for a truce.  You Maximals sta=
ted you needed our help, and then one of your member escalates and threaten=
s assault.  The rodent led to my termination, I believe I have cause for ca=
ndor with him.  In his defense, if you call it such a thing, your little fr=
iend powered up her weapons systems an threatened me."  

HIssing, continui=
ng as his sword was back in it's storage compartment.  "That is escalation,=
 all on the part of your own troops. Now you on top of that are threatening=
 again.  That is two escalations on the part o the Maximals, who claim mora=
l superiority.  A Predacon at the very least if he disagreed would not have=
 made such a show of things.  They would have been forthright where they st=
ood.  There woudl have been no gamesmechship.  Instead, you call us here fo=
r a truce, come off as instigating a fight, and then put all of it WHEN YOU=
 ARMED YOUR WEAPONS upon my spark."  Snorting, "That is somehow all my faul=
t now, when I only drew my own saber after I had been directly targeted."  =
Laughing, "And are you going to attack me again when the Rodent baited me, =
your friend threatened to attempt to attack me, and even now the two of the=
m continue to belittle and threaten me within audial receiver range?  Oh, a=
nd speak of how I am to get my cumuppance from them and such?  Truly, what =
are they, freshly sparked protoforms to utter such nonsense if this is trul=
y such a critical event that only our alliance would stop it that they wish=
 to instigate an altercation and then suffer no consequences for it, and pu=
t all of the responsibility upon another.  That extends to your faction, yo=
ur politics as a whole.  That is why you have made Cybertron rotten to the =
core."

Hissing, "Now, restrain your whelps and do not let them belittle me=
 further or at least have the candor if they wish to do so to do upon a fie=
ld of battle."  Turning back to Hydras and awaiting orders then.
